Description.Text: Radisson Blu Hotel Tashkent is a stylish 4-star property offering elegant accommodation in north Tashkent. Highlights include onsite dining, free Wi-Fi and parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a gym. Yunusabad is a primarily residential district situated north of central Tashkent. Nearby places of interest include a shopping centre, Tashkent Botanical Garden and Tashkent Water Park. Bodomzar metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Tashkent destinations. The hotel is housed in a contemporary mid-rise building with a sleek glass facade. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, a gym and sauna. Massages are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are approximately 25sqm and decorated in an elegant style with red and earth tones and carpeted floors. Amenities include tea and coffee equipment, complimentary bottled water, satellite TV, a safe, mini-bar and en-suite bathroom. Bosphorus Restaurant is open during winter and offers international cuisine in a modern dining room with floor-to-ceiling windows. Guests can also enjoy live piano music and a range of drinks in an elegant setting at the adjacent Piano Bar. Aqua Bar and Restaurant is open in summer and is situated besides the swimming pool. It serves international cuisine, snacks and cocktails. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service and offers a chargeable airport shuttle service.
